thread.title: Kim Kardashian Is Killing Herself In A Full Sweatsuit To Lose Those Last 7 Pounds!
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Is Killing Herself In A Full Sweatsuit To Lose Those Last 7 Pounds!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Kim Kardashian Is Killing Herself In A Full Sweatsuit To Lose Those Last 7 Pounds!
text:
2/21/2017 1:33 PM ET | Filed under: Kim Kardashian • Khloe Kardashian • Fitness • Body • Snapchat 
Kim has lost it! 
Kim Kardashian West is so determined to get down to 115 pounds she's doing her workouts in a full-on sweatsuit that looks like a black trash bag! It's similar to something Khloé Kardashian has worn in the past as well. 
The 36-year-old shared an image (above) on Snapchat of her in the suit with the caption: 
"7 lbs to go to get to 115 lbs" 
Sigh. 
This really can't be healthy. She's already so thin with such a tiny waist . Let's be real — all of her fat is in her boobs and ass! Does she really wanna risk making those two things smaller? We doubt it! 
The reality starlet also posted a clip of her workout on Snapchat (below):
